item.title: Bono Writes About Africa (My Eyes Begin to Roll)
item.description: I desperately wanted to hate [this][2] op-ed which the NYT published yesterday and Bono wrote, but at the end it was a rather good piece. There is this narrative which is beginning to form which is the first coherent, resonant, and positive narrative on Africa that I’ve heard.
